contexts.context: ...and has been for generation upon generation. With guidance and <mark>counsel</mark> of Almalexia, Vivec, and Sotha Sil, the Anticipations...
...wisdom and insight. Like loving ancestors, they guard and <mark>counsel</mark> their followers. Like stern parents, they punish sin and...
...and honor that once we shared, I would grant you <mark>counsel</mark> and power, if only you would pledge that friendship anew...
...not shun risk, nor hide behind the mask of cautious <mark>counsel</mark>, for fortune favors the bold.
